entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
